cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 3 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

privates.name: Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Enjoy the privacy of your own ensuite in this fresh, clean twin room with bed linen. Features all the essentials including flat screen TV, WIFI and security card access.  Towels & soap provided.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Enjoy the privacy of your own ensuite in this fresh, clean room with bed linen. Features all the essentials including flat screen TV, WIFI and security card access.   Queen size bed. Towels & soap provided.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: 5 Bed Family Room Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Spacious room including 1 Queen bed, 1 single bed and 1 set of bunk beds. Includes all the essentials like bed linen, keycard access, heater, fan and Wi-Fi.  BYO towels.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 11th Oct 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 11th Oct 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
